movies.name: Shrek
movies.review: This movie was so good and the voice acting was phenomenal! As the old saying goes: Shrek is love, Shrek is life
movies.summary: A mean lord exiles fairytale creatures to the swamp of a grumpy ogre, who must go on a quest and rescue a princess for the lord in order to get his land back.

movies.name: Madagascar
movies.review: Madagascar is a world renowned movie deserving of its' many oscar nominations
movies.summary: A group of animals who have spent all their life in a New York zoo end up in the jungles of Madagascar, and must adjust to living in the wild.

movies.name: Pokemon 2000
movies.review: Took my kids to see this movie just the other day, great fun for the whole family. Animation was absolutely superb. Makes me want to be a Pokemon master!
movies.summary: Ash Ketchum must gather the three spheres of fire, ice and lightning in order to restore balance to the Orange Islands.

movies.name: Transformers
movies.review: Not too thrilled about this subpar movie, they didn't even use enough explosions in the movie 1/10
movies.summary: An ancient struggle between two Cybertronian races, the heroic Autobots and the evil Decepticons, comes to Earth, with a clue to the ultimate power held by a teenager.

movies.name: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
movies.review: Harry Potter and all of his friends take on the secrets in the chambers beneath Hogwarts, leading them on a journey of self discovery, revalations, and sacrifice. A movie deserving of it's cult like following
movies.summary: An ancient prophecy seems to be coming true when a mysterious presence begins stalking the corridors of a school of magic and leaving its victims paralyzed.
